Sentencas: The performance of solid oxide cells (SOCs) is highly dependent on triple phase boundaries (TPBs).
Titulo: Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Therefore, detailed TPB characterization is crucial for their further development.
Titulo: Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: We demonstrate that it is possible to prepare a similar to 50 nm thick transmission electron microscopy (TEM) lamella of the interface between the dense ceramic electrolyte and the porous metallic/ceramic hydrogen electrode of an SOC using focused ion beam milling.
Titulo: Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: We show combined TEM/scanning TEM/energy-dispersive spectroscopy investigations of the nanostructure at the TPBs in a high-performance SOC.
Titulo: Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The chemical composition of nanoscale impurity phases at the TPBs has been obtained with a few nanometers lateral resolution.
Titulo: Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells
Nanoscale chemical analysis and imaging of solid oxide cells
